alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hamilton; Kearny; Morton; Stanton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 7:15PM CDT until June 30 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Hamilton County in southwestern Kansas... Morton County in southwestern Kansas... Southern Kearny County in southwestern Kansas... Grant County in southwestern Kansas... Stevens County in southwestern Kansas... Stanton County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 815 PM CDT/715 PM MDT/. * At 714 PM CDT/614 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles north of Johnson City to 12 miles north of Keyes, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elkhart, Wilburton, Rolla, Feterita and Hugoton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Grant; Hamilton; Kearny; Morton; Stanton; Stevens
